contentencoded: Last week, ARW producer Emily Hanford stopped by to talk about a trio of stories she’s been working on about the economy and how it’s affecting the choices people are making on getting a college education. This week, we’ll listen to the finished versions and follow up with Emily.

title: ARW Behind the Scenes: Episode 7, Education and the Economy, Part 2
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Last week, ARW producer Emily Hanford stopped by to talk about a trio of stories she’s been working on about the economy and how it’s affecting the choices people are making on getting a college education. This week, we’ll listen to the finished versions and follow up with Emily.
